data.title: Z for Zachariah
data.meta_description: Three young people find themselves caught up in a love triangle after a disaster has wiped out most of civilization.
data.text:
Format: DVD

Description: 1 videodisc (98 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in.

Three young people find themselves caught up in a love triangle after a disaster has wiped out most of civilization.

Target Audience: Rating: PG-13; for a scene of sexuality, partial nudity, and brief strong language.
